name: Meteora bangle
description: The Subtle Trilogy Bracelet features an elegant rhodium-plated design with three round-cut white crystals.

name: bracelet
description: The Meteora Bangle features a sleek, rhodium-plated design adorned with brilliant white crystals, combining modern elegance with timeless sophistication.

name: Necklace
description: The Swarovski Infinity necklace beautifully intertwines the timeless symbol of infinity with a delicate heart motif, adorned with dazzling white crystals and finished in a lustrous mixed metal. A symbol of eternal love and sophistication.

name: Potato Chips
description: Lay's India's Magic Masala Potato Chips (40g) offer a tantalizing fusion of spices, delivering an explosion of flavor in each crunchy chip. Ideal for quick indulgence, these chips are sure to spice up your snack time.

name: Solid Masti
description: Kurkure Solid Masti Masala Twisteez Crisps are a flavorful delight, blending a spicy kick with a satisfying crunch. Perfect for those craving an adventurous snack experience.

name: Veg Mayonnaise
description: Hellmann's Veg Mayonnaise offers a creamy, delicious taste perfect for sandwiches, salads, and dips. Made with quality ingredients, it provides a plant-based alternative without compromising on flavor.

name: Kellogs Cornflakes
description: Kellogg's Corn Flakes with Immuno Nutrients provides a nutritious and delicious breakfast option, enriched with essential vitamins and minerals to support your immune system.

name: Watches
description: Smartwatch with a 1.3-inch AMOLED display, water-resistant design, fitness tracking features, and a stylish silver color.

name: Television
description: Smartwatch with a 1.3-inch AMOLED display, water-resistant design, fitness tracking features, and a stylish silver color.

name: Laptop
description: Powerful laptop with a quad-core i5 processor, 8GB RAM, 256GB SSD, and a 14-inch FHD display.

name: Smartphone
description: Feature-rich smartphone with a 6.2-inch screen, 12MP dual camera, 128GB storage, and a 4000mAh battery.

name: Wireless Headphones
description: High-quality wireless headphones with over-ear design, 20 hours of battery life, and a sleek black color.

name: Speakers
description: High-quality wireless headphones with over-ear design, 20 hours of battery life, and a sleek black color.

name: Biscuit
description: Britannia NutriChoice Digestive High Fibre Biscuits offer a wholesome snacking experience with their rich fiber content, promoting digestive health. Enjoy a delicious blend of taste and nutrition in every crunchy bite.

name: Milkybar Choo
description: Indulge in the delightful sweetness of Milkybar Choo Strawberry Chocolate Pack. Each bite delivers a burst of creamy strawberry flavor, making it a perfect treat for all strawberry and chocolate lovers.

name: Earrings
description: The Attract Trilogy hoop earrings feature a stunning round cut design, embellished with radiant white crystals, and elegantly plated in rhodium for a timeless shine. A chic accessory that adds sparkle to any ensemble.

name: Pendant
description: The Hyperbola pendant showcases a captivating blend of mixed cuts, accentuated by a mesmerizing infinity motif, adorned with pristine white crystals, and finished with a brilliant rhodium plating. A statement piece exuding sophistication and allure.
